text: :Not to be confused with John R. Ross and John K. Ross, curlers from Northern Ontario John Ross (born February 19 1938) is a Canadian former curler. He was the third on the 1967 Brier Champion team, representing Ontario (skipped by Alf Phillips, Jr.). The team later went on to finish third at the World Championships of that year.Alfie Phillips had a good time on and off the ice: [FIN Edition] Neil MacCarl Toronto Star. Toronto Star [Toronto, Ont] 23 Feb 1987: D8. ==References== Category:Brier champions Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Curlers from Ontario Category:Canadian male curlers
title: John Ross (curler)
